net.sourceforge.waters.model.base

Interface AttributeFactory


  • public interface AttributeFactory
    A configuration utility to define user defined attributes. An attribute factory defines names and possible values of attributes for given proxy classes. This can be used by the GUI to provide suggestions to the user when editing attribute maps.
    Author:
    Robi Malik

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<String> getApplicableKeys(Class<? extends Proxy> clazz)
      Returns a list of attribute names that can be used for an item of the given type.
      List<String> getApplicableValues(String attrib)
      Returns a list of attribute values that can be used for an attribute with the given name.

    • Method Detail

      • getApplicableKeys

        Collection<String> getApplicableKeys(Class<? extends Proxy> clazz)
        Returns a list of attribute names that can be used for an item of the given type.
        Parameters:
        clazz - A proxy class or interface for which attributes are sought.
        Returns:
        The attribute names for objects of this type, in any order. If no attributes are applicable, an empty collection is returned.

      • getApplicableValues

        List<String> getApplicableValues(String attrib)
        Returns a list of attribute values that can be used for an attribute with the given name.
        Parameters:
        attrib - The name of the attribute to be given a value.
        Returns:
        List of attribute value strings in the order suggested to the user. If the attribute takes no value, an empty list is returned.
